import styles from "./jobBox.module.css"; import hide from './../../hide.svg' import { ApplyModal } from "./ApplyModal"; import { useState,useEffect} from "react"; export function JobBox({ item }) { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [isSave,setIsSave]=useState(false); const [user,setUser]=useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const user =JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) setUser(user) },[]) const handleSave=()=>{ setIsSave(prev=>!prev) } return (
setIsOpen(false)}>

{item.name}

{item.desc}

{item.employees}

ACTIVELY HIRING

{item.job}

{item.location}

₹{item.salaryMin}L-₹{item.salaryMax}L

1 week ago

Save

Hide
); }
